title: Trailcraft launches carbon fiber kids MTB, carbon wheels & carbon suspension fork
content:
Trailcraft Cycles upped the game on kids mountain bikes when they launched in 2014, and now they’re upping their own game with new carbon fiber frames for 24″ and 26″ models, and their own carbon fiber rims and a custom carbon suspension fork. Perhaps most impressive, they actually have them all in stock! Trailcraft Pineridge

The post Trailcraft launches carbon fiber kids MTB, carbon wheels & carbon suspension fork appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
